Combining Ranges
(void) - unionPlotRange:
 Extends the range to include another range. The sign of length is unchanged.

 Sets the messaged object to the intersection with another range. The sign of length is unchanged.

 Moves the whole range so that the location fits in other range.

 Moves the whole range so that the end point fits in other range.

Detailed Description

Defines a range of plot data.

- (CPPlotRangeComparisonResult) compareToNumber: (NSNumber *)  number  

Compares a number to the range, determining if it is in the range, or above or below it.

The comparison result.

- (BOOL) contains: (NSDecimal)  number  

Determines whether a given number is inside the range.

Parameters:
number The number to check.
Returns:
True if location ≤ number ≤ end.

- (BOOL) containsDouble: (double)  number  

Determines whether a given number is inside the range.

Parameters:
number The number to check.
Returns:
True if location ≤ number ≤ end.

- (void) expandRangeByFactor: (NSDecimal)  factor  

Extends/contracts the range by a factor.

Parameters:
factor Factor used. A value of 1.0 gives no change. Less than 1.0 is a contraction, and greater than 1.0 is expansion.

- (id) initWithLocation: (NSDecimal)  loc
length: (NSDecimal)  len 

Initializes a newly allocated CPPlotRange object with the provided location and length.

Parameters:
loc The starting location of the range.
len The length of the range.
Returns:
The initialized CPPlotRange object.

- (void) intersectionPlotRange: (CPPlotRange *)  other  

Sets the messaged object to the intersection with another range. The sign of length is unchanged.

Parameters:
other The other plot range.

- (BOOL) isEqualToRange: (CPPlotRange *)  otherRange  

Determines whether a given range is equal to the range of the receiver.

Parameters:
otherRange The range to check.
Returns:
True if the ranges both have the same location and length.

+ (CPPlotRange *) plotRangeWithLocation: (NSDecimal)  loc
length: (NSDecimal)  len 

Creates and returns a new CPPlotRange instance initialized with the provided location and length.

Parameters:
loc The starting location of the range.
len The length of the range.
Returns:
A new CPPlotRange instance initialized with the provided location and length.

- (void) shiftEndToFitInRange: (CPPlotRange *)  otherRange  

Moves the whole range so that the end point fits in other range.

Parameters:
otherRange Other range. The minimum possible shift is made. The range length is unchanged.

- (void) shiftLocationToFitInRange: (CPPlotRange *)  otherRange  

Moves the whole range so that the location fits in other range.

Parameters:
otherRange Other range. The minimum possible shift is made. The range length is unchanged.

- (void) unionPlotRange: (CPPlotRange *)  other  

Extends the range to include another range. The sign of length is unchanged.

Parameters:
other The other plot range.
